message.content:
1. 11 patients died from treatment-related causes.
2. Three patients who died were from the twice-daily group.
3. Eight patients who died were from the once-daily group.

messages.content:
Statement: 11 patients died from treatment-related causes (three in the twice-daily group and eight in the once-daily group).

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
